attributes.action: Grant the people of the Shetland islands a referendum a on whether we consider ourselves British or Danish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Shetlan Isles are an ancient outpost of Denmark, yet since King Alexander ||| of Scotland began the subjugation of our islands in 1262, Danish identity has been airbrushed from the islands. Our oil revenues are sucked away to the London treasury yet we recieve barely any of it back through the Barnett formula which only seems to benefit Glasgow and Edinburgh. Let's reunite with Denmark :)
